div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1147 Pattraeus, N of mod. Taman', Kras- nodar Territory, RSFSR, 1950 Burial: c. 63 B.C. (Golenko) Contents: 82 AE Panticapaeum: 2 AE (as BMC 34) Unc. Bosporus: 40 AE (as Minns, pl. 9, 21) Unc. Pontus-Paphlagonia: 2 AE (types of RGA I.1, pl. 7, 10) Sinope: 34 AE (as RGA I.1, pl. 26, 6-7) Unc.: 4 AE Disposition: Moscow â€ Krushkol, VDI 1952, no. 3, pp. 137-47; KS IIMK 66 (1956), pp. 116-7 Pakhomov VII, 1720
